bio: Hello - Kyle here from Gitcoin. I am currently the Executive Director of the Gitcoin Foundation and one of the contributors leading Gitcoin's efforts in market.
contributionDescription:
Gitcoin builds novel solutions to enable communities to build and fund what matters. This proposal outlines our contributions and requests RPGF funds to continue our impact. Gitcoin has always believed in the power of decentralized communities and the importance of public goods. Our contributions to the Optimism ecosystem include:

- Grants Program: We have funded numerous projects building on or supporting the Optimism ecosystem through our grants program. This has enabled developers and teams to bring their innovative ideas to life, further enriching the Optimism community.

- Knowledge Sharing: Gitcoin has hosted webinars, workshops, and AMA sessions with experts from the Optimism community, spreading knowledge and fostering deeper community engagement.

contributionLinks.description: Impact details for Gitcoin's Grants Program

impactDescription:
Gitcoin has been instrumental in delivering value to the OP ecosystem:
- Funding for projects
- Filling blockspace
- Launching a Superchain Layer 2
- Partnering with OP to drive technology and protocol innovation within the RPGF experience (Project Registry, Gitcoin Allo, etc.)
- Supporting and partnering to grow the narrative around public goods funding

Details of our impact can be found below:
Gitcoin Grants:
OP GG: $1.8M+ funded
OP GG: 320k+ Contributions 
OP Unique Wallets: 56k+
OP Grants Funded: 625
GG Wallets on 8/28: 7,570 (7.74% of all OP wallets on that day)
GG Wallets on 8/29: 7,693 (8.07% of all OP wallets on that day)

Network Activity:
OP + PGN: $2.1M+ Funded
OP + PGN: 387k+ Contributions
OP + PGN Unique Wallets: 58k+
OP/PGN Grants Funded: 679

fundingSources.description: Services revenue for running grants rounds on behalf of various communities

pwCategorySuggestions: Developer Ecosystem, Funding Platform, Community Building
pwRecategorizeReason: NO. The application is categorized as a "PROJECT" but it's from an "INDIVIDUAL" named Kyle who is associated with the Gitcoin project.
